title: OpenAI just unveiled a new subscription tier called ChatGPT Pro. Users can pay $200 a month for almost unlimited access to ChatGPT’s tools, and an exclusive new AI model.
content: OpenAI launched ChatGPT Pro, a $200 monthly subscription for its flagship chatbot. Everything from OpenAI’s $20 monthly subscription is included at this price level. This release is the first of many expected during the next 12 days, as the San Francisco startup has scheduled a slew of announcements.
author: Reece Rogers
